ModMetaData.name: Signalis Soundtrack
ModMetaData.description:
The story of starcrossed lovers and the horrors of the world that they live in. As you explore the Rim you'll feel a hole in your heart that is telling you that she is in that ancient danger and she needs your help.
Tracks: Turned Around, Safe Room, Causal Loop, Double Back, Pneumatic, Eternity in a Box, Visions of Alina, Incinerator, Intensive Care, Train Ride, Ritual, MNHR, Mynah, Adler, Dowsing, Bodies, Hamstrung, Riot Control, Kolibri, Eulenlieder, Orrery, Ewige Wiederkunft, Liminality, Kentucky Meat Shower, Haint Tales, Misremembered, Nue, Matryoshka, Labyrinth, Prison, Coal Ash Slurry, Sea Smoke, Ritual (Nowhere), The Red Gate, Die Toteninsel (Emptiness), Memory, 3000 Cycles (I Missed You), Near Dark by the Pond, Lived In, I Can’t Stop Now, Rogue Wave, You Have Changed, Cigarette Wife, Rotfront (Moon), Dream Diary, Blockwart, Teeth, Double Back (VHS Version), Home, Ariane’s Theme, Falke’s Theme, Become Whole Again, The Promise, Crepuscular, Troublesome Creek, Warm Light
ModMetaData.author: karbonpanzer
